text: kani varilo paripurnamaina jnanam galavaru mariyu visvasulainavaru, nipai avatarimpajeyabadina danini mariyu niku purvam avatarimpajeyabadina vatini visvasistaru. Varu namaj vidhiga saluputaru, vidhidanam (jakat) cellistaru mariyu allah yandu mariyu antima dinamu nandu visvasam kaligi untaru; ilanti variki memu goppa pratiphalanni prasadistamu
